content: crochet matinee baby outfit - this complete matinee outfit consists of a coat bonnet and pants perfect for that day out just takes approx 150grams of yarn in each colour the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size to fit approx - 16 chest 0-3 month baby level intermediate copyright ©2024 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-matinee-baby-outfit/
